content: Got it, will replace the current content with a top nav.

{"status": "success", "ui_elements_checklist": [{"feature": "Add a detailed guide or tooltip explaining ED25519 public key requirement for user clarity", "checked": true}, {"feature": "Implement a clearly visible connect button for EVM ECDSA wallets at the top of the app", "checked": true}, {"feature": "Incorporate a compatibility check feature for the provided public key type", "checked": false}, {"feature": "Include a real-time chat support or FAQ section for assistance with public keys and wallet connections", "checked": false}, {"feature": "Offer a dynamic indicator or status bar showing wallet connection status", "checked": true}, {"feature": "Provide step-by-step instructions or a video tutorial on how to find and submit their ED25519 public key", "checked": false}], "input_token_count": 236, "output_token_count": 157, "time_taken": "0:00:13.261935"}

The user initiated the conversation with a request for building a list of popular crypto projects for staking ETH, specifying features like average yield, risk score, likelihood of slashing, and a big "auto-stake" button, all within a bright red theme reminiscent of Netflix. They emphasized the inclusion of interactive elements such as a yield calculator, user reviews, real-time notifications, and educational content, and sought feedback on the representation of risk scores and the placement of the "auto-stake" feature's explanation. Additionally, the user wanted to create a node operator onboarding section that included wallet connection, $SXT token staking, and public key submission, requesting a section dedicated to this purpose. A shift in focus to a travel booking app was seen with a request for replacing parts of the application's interface with an SVG of a cat, later changed to a significant SVG of an airplane and requests for a purple-themed navigation bar and customer support form. Other proposed enhancements included redesigning the top navigation with a beautiful purple theme, implementing buttons for login functionalities, adding a comprehensive footer with a purple theme, wrapping existing feature sections in purple shaded containers for a detailed customer support ticket submission form, and overhauling the hero section with a new design that includes a call to action and a bottom testimonial section—all in a bright purple shaded theme with rounded/beveled edges. Throughout the conversation, the AI acknowledged each request, providing affirmation of understanding and commitment to implementing the mentioned changes.
